name: Rasmalai
description: Super Soft Cottage Cheese cooked in Milky Syrup.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft and Delicious Berry Sized balls of Milk Solids, flour & a leavening agent. Soaked in flavored honey syrup.

name: Rice Pudding
description: Rich Saffron Flavor rice Pudding,Warm Spices

name: Jerry
description: Deep-fried maida flour (plain flour or all-purpose flour) batter in pretzel or circular shapes and soaking them in sugar syrup.

name: Gud-Paak
description: Made with a base of khuwa which is made with cow’s or buffalo’s milk mixed with dried fruits or nuts such as almonds, cashews, coconuts, pistachio, dates, fox nuts (makhana) and decorated with watermelon seeds and dry grapes (raisins).

name: Rasbari
description: Small white milk balls usually soaked in a sugary syrup

name: Peda
description: Sweet made with sweetened condensed milk or khuwa and sugar usually circular shaped and topped with traditional flavorings such as pistachios or almonds.
